title: Lonely.
content: How do you all cope with being all alone in hostel during this Diwali?  All my friends and roommates have gone home as they stay near banglore and I'm practically alone for 5 more days , which bothers me cause I hate being alone.

comments.body:
Why are you sad, do whatever you want. 

Watch 5 movies a day, finish a tv show, jerk it a couple times, sleep at 3 am, sleep at 3 pm, the sky's the limit. 

4 days'll be over before you know it, make sure you enjoy them
mutthi maar le bhai aur kya
Go outside and roam parks, national parks
Having a hostel room all to yourself is a privilege according to me
Bhenchod Corridor me mutthi maar ...dewaare safed kar de
Not as smart as you akka
sorry brother, i m going home
Muth mar le bhai bed pe let me puchega kaun
Play all the main line pokemon games or bingewatch all of starwars or  watch dbz or play terraria or vist some places
You got a day left. Just to 3x of what you'd otherwise do
Same here ðŸ¥² . BTW , I live in BMSCE hostel 1st year
Shanky ji hamesha notty mood mein ðŸ¤¤
Do you have family in the city? If you do you can visit them.  Otherwise take a trip home for those 5 days.
